name: streamingapp-monorepo
description: Plataforma integral de streaming con backend Node.js, frontend React+Vite y Storybook
author: Kike Torillo <arellanestorillo@yahoo.com>

scripts.dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down --volumes --remove-orphans && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build
scripts.dev:restart: npm run stop && npm run dev:up
scripts.prod:restart: npm run stop && npm run prod:up
scripts.dev:local: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:storybook"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.update:all: npm update && npm run update:backend && npm run update:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.lint:fix:backend: cd backend/app && npm run lint -- --fix || true
scripts.lint:fix:frontend: cd frontend/app && npm run lint -- --fix || true
scripts.health: docker compose ps && docker system df
scripts.env:copy: cp example.env .env && echo '✅ Archivo .env creado desde example.env'
scripts.env:validate: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('✅ Variables de entorno cargadas correctamente');"
scripts.up:backend: docker compose up -d app postgres minio
scripts.up:cdn: docker compose up -d cdn1 transcoder1 transcoder2
scripts.shell:db: docker exec -it postgres psql -U admin -d streamingApp
scripts.clean:full: npm run clean && docker image prune -af && docker volume prune -f && docker network prune -f
scripts.backup:db: docker exec postgres pg_dump -U admin streamingApp > backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.restore:db: echo 'Uso: docker exec -i postgres psql -U admin streamingApp < backup_file.sql'
scripts.monitor:services: docker compose ps && docker compose top
scripts.check:health: curl -f http://localhost:3000 && curl -f http://localhost:5173 && curl -f http://localhost:6006
